title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 5
description: You are the murderer here dream.

dialogueTree.title: Limbic System: "Like a deftly cast fishing net, sle..."
dialogueTree.english: Like a deftly cast fishing net, sleep pulls you out of the world and into its dark shore. The rough mesh chafes, then, tightening around you, it digs into your brain.
dialogueTree.polish: Sen, niczym zręcznie rzucona sieć, wyciąga cię ze świata na swój mroczny brzeg. Szorstkie sploty ocierają się o ciebie, po czym zaciskają się i wpijają w twój mózg.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Сон, нібы ўмела закінутая сетка, выцягвае цябе з свету на свой цёмны бераг. Шурпатыя пляценні кранаюцца цябе, пасля чаго зацягваюцца і ўпіваюцца ў твой мозг.

links.title: You: "Great. This is gonna be really chil..."
links.english: Great. This is gonna be really chill.
links.polish: Świetnie. Będzie wreszcie trochę luzu.
links.belarusian: Выдатна. Нарэшце будзе крыху свабоды.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "How've things been going for you ou..."
links.english: How've things been going for you out there? Helped anyone lately? Saved anyone lately? *Murdered* anyone lately?
links.polish: No i jak ci tam leci? Pomogłeś może komuś? Albo uratowałeś? *Zamordowałeś* kogoś?
links.belarusian: Ну і як табе там ідзе? Можа, каму дапамог? Ці ўратаваў? *Забіў* кагосьці?

links.title: Rhetoric: "This bastard isn't even listening t..."
links.english: This bastard isn't even listening to you!
links.polish: Ten drań cię nawet nie słucha!
links.belarusian: Гэты нягоднік цябе нават не слухае!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Because, you know, you *are* a murd..."
links.english: Because, you know, you *are* a murderer. A disco music listening psycho-killer who offs poor people -- and then *forgets* about it.
links.polish: Bo, no wiesz, *jesteś* mordercą. Zakochanym w disco psychozabójcą, który załatwia nieszczęsnych ludzi, a potem o tym *zapomina*.
links.belarusian: Бо, ну ведаеш, *ты* забойца. Закаханы ў дыска псіхазабойцу, які распраўляецца з няшчаснымі людзьмі, а потым пра гэта *забывае*.

links.title: You: "I don't care. That doesn't scare me..."
links.english: I don't care. That doesn't scare me.
links.polish: Mam to gdzieś. Nie przeraża mnie to.
links.belarusian: Мне гэта абыякава. Гэта мяне не палохае.

links.title: Limbic System: "Hear that? You were *naive* to thin..."
links.english: Hear that? You were *naive* to think he's afraid of his bloodied hands, soul brother. Oh no, I see inside his amygdala and his hippocampus. The thing he's *really* scared of...
links.polish: Słyszysz to? Byłeś *naiwniakiem*, myśląc, że przestraszy się krwi na swoich rękach, bracie w duszy. O nie, zaglądam w jego ciało migdałowate i w jego hipokamp. To, czego się *naprawdę* boi...
links.belarusian: Ты гэта чуеш? Ты быў *наіўным*, думаючы, што яго напалохала б кроў на руках, брат у душы. О не, я заглядаю ў яго мигдалевидное цела і ў яго гіпакамп. Тое, чаго ён *сапраўды* баіцца...

links.title: Limbic System: "...is much, *much* worse than that."
links.english: ...is much, *much* worse than that.
links.polish: ...jest o wiele, *wiele* gorsze.
links.belarusian: ...значна, *значна* горш.

links.title: You: "What is it?"
links.english: What is it?
links.polish: I co to jest?
links.belarusian: І што гэта?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Don't tell him, sister. It's too ba..."
links.english: Don't tell him, sister. It's too bad.
links.polish: Nie mów mu, siostro. To zbyt straszne.
links.belarusian: Не кажы яму, сястра. Гэта занадта страшна.

links.title: Volition: "They're right. This is their functi..."
links.english: They're right. This is their function. To keep you from *it*.
links.polish: Mają rację. Takie jest ich zadanie. Chronić cię przed *tym*.
links.belarusian: Яны маюць рацыю. Такім з'яўляецца іх заданне. Абараніць цябе ад *гэтага*.

links.title: You: "Why are you doing this? I just want..."
links.english: Why are you doing this? I just want to sleep. I can almost see the dark.
links.polish: Czemu wy to robicie? Chcę po prostu snu. Widzę już prawie jego mrok.
links.belarusian: Чаму вы гэта робіце? Я проста хачу сну. Я ўжо амаль бачу яго цемру.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "We're trying to help you. All these..."
links.english: We're trying to help you. All these processes -- these tortures, voices and tremors -- are all just *distractions*. Flares and countermeasures. To keep you from the *last dream*. The worst of them all.
links.polish: Próbujemy ci pomóc. Te wszystkie procesy – tortury, głosy, wstrząsy – mają tylko *odwracać uwagę*. Są jak flary przeciwrakietowe. Mają cię chronić przed *ostatnim snem*. Najgorszym z nich wszystkich.
links.belarusian: Мы спрабуем табе дапамагчы. Усе гэтыя працэсы – катаванні, галасы, шокі – павінны толькі *адцягваць увагу*. Яны як супрацьракетныя фаеры. Яны павінны абараніць цябе ад *апошняга сну*. Найгоршага з усіх.

links.title: You: "The... last dream?"
links.english: The... last dream?
links.polish: Ostatnim snem...?
links.belarusian: Апошнім сном...?

links.title: Limbic System: "The last dream will be total annihi..."
links.english: The last dream will be total annihilation. Cinders peeling off the fuselage. We won't be there to help you anymore, Harry. We will be dormant. You will be naked and alone.
links.polish: Ostatni sen będzie całkowitym zniszczeniem. Obracającym się w popiół kadłubem. Nie będzie nas tam, żebyśmy ci pomogli, Harry. Będziemy uśpieni. Będziesz nagi i samotny.
links.belarusian: Апошні сон будзе поўным знішчэннем. Пакрываючыся ў попел корпусам. Нас не будзе там, каб дапамагчы табе, Гары. Мы будзем спаць. Ты будзеш голы і адзінокі.

links.title: You: "And the air will smell of apricots...."
links.english: And the air will smell of apricots...
links.polish: A powietrze będzie pachnieć morelami...
links.belarusian: А паветра будзе пахнуць абрыкосамі...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Of hell and ancient sadness, brothe..."
links.english: Of hell and ancient sadness, brother. Ten thousand years later -- in front of the video rental. There is a warm breath on your face again. Everything is *okay* again.
links.polish: ...piekłem i pradawnym smutkiem, bracie. Dziesięć tysięcy lat później – przed wypożyczalnią wideo. Na twojej twarzy znów czuć ciepły oddech. Wszystko jest znowu *dobrze*.
links.belarusian: ...пеклам і даўнім сумам, брат. Дзясяць тысяч гадоў пазней – перад пракатам відэа. На тваім твары зноў адчуваецца цёплае дыханне. Усё зноў *добра*.

links.title: Limbic System: "Everything is *so* okay."
links.english: Everything is *so* okay.
links.polish: Wszystko jest *zupełnie* w porządku.
links.belarusian: Усё *зусім* у парадку.

links.title: You: "Doesn't sound like it will be okay."
links.english: Doesn't sound like it will be okay.
links.polish: Nie brzmi, jakby miało być dobrze.
links.belarusian: Не гучыць, быццам усё будзе добра.

links.title: Limbic System: "Your eyelids flutter open for a mom..."
links.english: Your eyelids flutter open for a moment. When you close them again, you sense the light of the room around you -- you're back. In two seconds the alarm will ring.
links.polish: Twoje powieki się na moment otwierają. Gdy je znów zamykasz, dostrzegasz już przez nie światło słońca w pokoju. Wróciłeś. Za dwie sekundy zadzwoni budzik.
links.belarusian: Твае павекі на момант адкрываюцца. Калі ты іх зноў закрываеш, ужо бачыш праз іх святло сонца ў пакоі. Ты вярнуўся. Праз дзве секунды задзвоніць будзільнік.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The last thought in your head befor..."
links.english: The last thought in your head before waking is: maybe you shouldn't have seen that stained glass window? In the church....
links.polish: Ostatnia myśl w twojej głowie przed przebudzeniem to: może nie powinieneś był widzieć tego okna z malowidłem? W kościele...
links.belarusian: Апошняя думка ў тваёй галаве перад абуджэннем: можа быць, ты не павінен быў бачыць гэтае акно з малюнкам? У касцёле...

links.title: You: "[Open your eyes.]"
links.english: [Open your eyes.]
links.polish: [Otwórz oczy].
links.belarusian: [Адчыні вочы].

links.title: Inland Empire: "The last thought in your head befor..."
links.english: The last thought in your head before waking is: you need to go to the church...
links.polish: Ostatnia myśl w twojej głowie przed przebudzeniem to: muszę iść do kościoła...
links.belarusian: Апошняя думка ў галаве перад прачынаннем: я павінен пайсці ў касцёл...

links.title: You: "I can't wait. I can't wait..."
links.english: I can't wait. I can't wait...
links.polish: Nie mogę się doczekać. Nie mogę się doczekać...
links.belarusian: Не магу дачакацца. Не магу дачакацца...

links.title: You: "Her face forms in summertime..."
links.english: Her face forms in summertime...
links.polish: Jej twarz pojawia się wśród lata...
links.belarusian: Яе твар з'яўляецца сярод лета...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "...in hell and ancient sadness, bro..."
links.english: ...in hell and ancient sadness, brother. Ten thousand years later -- in front of the video rental. There is a warm breath on your face again. Everything is *okay* again.
links.polish: ...w piekle i pradawnym smutku, bracie. A dziesięć tysięcy lat później – przed wypożyczalnią wideo. Na twojej twarzy znów czuć ciepły oddech. Wszystko jest znowu *dobrze*.
links.belarusian: ...у пекле і спрадвечным смутку, браце. А дзесяць тысяч гадоў пазней - перад відэапракатам. На тваім твары зноў адчуваецца цёплы подых. Усё зноў *добра*.

links.title: You: "I don't *want to* anymore. I don't..."
links.english: I don't *want to* anymore. I don't want to think either one of those things.
links.polish: Ja już *nie chcę*. Nie chcę myśleć o żadnej z tych rzeczy.
links.belarusian: Я ўжо *не хачу*. Не хачу думаць пра ніводную з гэтых рэчаў.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Oh, but you *will*. You're already..."
links.english: Oh, but you *will*. You're already *going* there. Slipping. How long can we keep you from the precipice? *One* more dream? Two max, baby. Then it's...
links.polish: Och, ale *będziesz*. Już *zacząłeś* tę drogę. Już powinęła ci się noga. Jak długo zdołamy trzymać cię z dala od przepaści? Przez *jeden* sen? Nie więcej niż dwa, dziecinko. A potem...
links.belarusian: Ох, але *будзеш*. Вось ужо *пачаў* гэты шлях. Ужо спатыкнуўся. Як доўга зможам трымаць цябе далёка ад прорвы? Цягам *адной* ночы? Не больш за дзве, дзеткі. А потым...

links.title: You: "Okay, so I'm a murderer and that's..."
links.english: Okay, so I'm a murderer and that's *bad*.
links.polish: No dobra, więc jestem mordercą i to *źle*.
links.belarusian: Ну добра, вось я забойца і гэта *дрэнна*.

links.title: Limbic System: "Hear that? He doesn't even flinch...."
links.english: Hear that? He doesn't even flinch. Ice-man doesn't care about killing people. That's *nothing* to him. Black water under the bridge. The thing he's *really* scared of...
links.polish: Słyszysz to? Nawet się nie wzdrygnął. Pana niewzruszonego nie przeraża zabijanie ludzi. To dla niego *nic*. Zeszłoroczny śnieg. To, czego się *naprawdę* boi...
links.belarusian: Чуеш гэта? Ён нават не ўздрыгнуў. Пана неўзрушальнага не палохае забойства людзей. Гэта для яго *нічога*. Леташні снег. Тое, чаго ён *сапраўды* баіцца...

links.title: You: "Shut up, I just want to sleep."
links.english: Shut up, I just want to sleep.
links.polish: Zamknij się, chcę po prostu spać.
links.belarusian: Зачыніся, я проста хачу спаць.

links.title: Limbic System: "Hear that? Ice-man wants to sleep,..."
links.english: Hear that? Ice-man wants to sleep, he doesn't care about killing people. That's *nothing* to him. Black water under the bridge. The thing he's *really* scared of...
links.polish: Słyszysz to? Pan niewzruszony chce spać, co go obchodzi zabijanie ludzi. To dla niego *nic*. Zeszłoroczny śnieg. To, czego się *naprawdę* boi...
links.belarusian: Чуеш гэта? Пан непахісны хоча спаць, што яго хвалюе забойства людзей. Гэта для яго *нішто*. Леташні снег. Тое, чаго ён *насамрэч* баіцца...

links.title: You: "Dark shore, my ass. I know what thi..."
links.english: Dark shore, my ass. I know what this is.
links.polish: Dupa tam, a nie mroczny brzeg. Wiem, co to za miejsce.
links.belarusian: Дупа там, а не змрочны бераг. Я ведаю, што гэта за месца.

links.title: You: "Yeah-yeah, just let me sleep..."
links.english: Yeah-yeah, just let me sleep...
links.polish: Tak, tak. Dajcie mi spać...
links.belarusian: Так, так. Дайце мне паспаць...
